Reviews.Title: “Average hotel right beside metro”
Reviews.Author: PeepsRyan
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel nights weekend recently mentioned previous reviews hotel 5th floor building reachable nice oldfashioned lift hotel building clean functional clean despite anniversary italy hotel didnt inspire romance am afraid easily hear neighbours door arguing talking im regular prices hotel season suspect rates hiked due rome marathon stay didnt prior arrival bad noticed staff speak little english mornings creased clothes guy reception didnt understand looking loan house iron breakfast fine write home fine close metro ideal sightseeing dont time walk mobility issues

Reviews.Title: “Location”
Reviews.Author: Marianne K
Reviews.Content: stayed mother cousin 7 nights staff nice friendly breakfast plentiful bathroom bit lift otherwise clean charming world lift 5th floor hotel shops close metro corner walking distance recommend hotel

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel in great location”
Reviews.Author: IrishRover31
Reviews.Content: enjoyed stayed hotel mentioned location sightseeing metro outside hotel easy walking distance colesseum staff friendly helpful stayed clean single double bed nice nice teacoffee facilities especially day sightseeing walking restaurants reasonably priced tourist ate couple times correct name similar streets hotel lift fashioned charm definitely stay

Reviews.Title: “Nice, quiet and friendly hotel in a good location - great value for money”
Reviews.Author: HighlanderGav
Reviews.Content: stayed 5 nights couple 2 children 10 14 spacious quiet slept logs clean able check downside 10ft wardrobes required pole hang clothes couple cracked tiles slightly leaky shower screen minor seen worse 5 hotels people complained lift 5th floor charming authentic agatha christie feel hotel personal larger hotels cramped staff friendly courteous helpful breakfast continental mix cold meat cheese pastries bread juices coffee machine teacoffee facilities hotel kept machine day location 2 mins walk underground near buses trams 10 min walk colosseum plenty restaurants nearby little supermarket 2 mins road stock fresh bread freshly cut italian hams drinks etc picnics definitely hotel visit rome

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful Hotel, Warm, Friendly Staff”
Reviews.Author: TWisdom
Reviews.Content: hotel wonderful fooled exterior inside clean tastefully decorated comfortable staff professional welcoming accommodating actually hotel hotel staying previously frustrated awful service simply left forfeiting night hotel fees rate extremely satisfied hotel value money unbelievably cheap accommodations service provided

Reviews.Title: “Don't listen to the negative reviews. It's a great hotel!”
